articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: Google to embrace Anthropic’s standard for connecting AI models to data - TechCrunch
articles.description: Just a few weeks after OpenAI said it would adopt rival Anthropic’s standard for connecting AI models to the systems where data resides, Google is following suit.
articles.content:
Just a few weeks after OpenAI said it would adopt rival Anthropics standard for connecting AI models to the systems where data resides, Google is following suit. 
In a post on X on Wednesday, Google… [+1001 chars]
